lore:
Vyre, skilled with the blade, worked for the Auditors under the name of Dawn, while Sevalah, a scholar of magic and a powerful sorceress, was known among its members as Gloom.

Rodia's authorities consider the arrival of the Soulflayers a great threat, due to their thirst for power which generally creates discord among the other species.

During a raid, the Soulflayer Drone flies over its target, casting spells left and right in order to prevent the defender from noticing the true threat.
menagerieDialog: The flora and fauna of your world are remarkably diverse.
I hunger for more souls. Let us depart at once!
(Something about this creature seems incredibly familiar.)
There is a traitor in our midst. His name is Nortah.
I shall take control of Everett's mind and force him to make grilled cheese sandwiches for all of us. It will be delightful.
name: Soulflayer Drone
